name: University Intake Game C++
description:
I wrote this game in C++ as an intake project in 2019. The game story is about leaving a post-apocalyptic Russia and has chasing and top-down action as core mechanics. The idea was mostly inspired by the Last of Us.

THERE CAN BE BUGS WHEN PLAYING ON 2 MONITORS, PLEASE CONSIDER USING 1 (I am sorry, I did not have a 2 monitor back then). Moreover, the sound can be too loud. 

To scroll notes use Arrow Keys (no tutorial for this).

Not sure if it can even run on other machines, but if it does, I wish everyone luck and a good time with it.

PLEASE WRITE SOMETHING!
